message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $14,000. I think it's a fair price considering its potential worth to your operations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, I believe my initial offer of $14,000 accurately reflects the value this product brings. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,500.  This offer stands as a testament to my willingness to negotiate fairly.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $13,500 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
